caption:
• MOTHERS DAY GIFT IDEA • 

Like 🫶 and comment MD2025 and I’ll send you a DM with my tips for using this shrink paper successfully as well as a link to the pack we use! 
.
This shrink paper has so many uses, but with Mother’s Day around the corner I love to use them as keepsake gifts for grandparents, or they’re also a great activity for your partner to do with your kids as a gift to you this Mother’s Day! 
.
.
.
